## 🛠️ Installation des dépendances    
```bash
npm create vite@latest
```
```bash
npm install
```
```bash
npm install sass --save-dev
```

## 🛠️ Tech Utilisées
- [React](https://reactjs.org/)
- [Sass](https://sass-lang.com/)

## 🛠️ Bibliothèques utilisées
- [Mui (material-UI)](https://mui.com/)
- [GSAP](https://gsap.com/)
